Key Match Events: LeBron James hit a game-winning three-pointer at the buzzer
Post-Match Reflections: Despite turning 40 at the end of December, James is still proving that his clutch gene hasn't gone anywhere
James and the Lakers improve to 9-4 under head coach JJ Redick
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James hasn't displayed the'silencer' pose in quite some time, but the King felt the need for it to return on Saturday
